text: The Christian Party (also the Scottish Christian Party and Welsh Christian Party ) is a minor political party in Great Britain. It started in May 2004 in Stornoway by George Hargreaves, a Pentecostal minister. It was then called Operation Christian Vote. It contested the 2004 European Elections in the Scotland constituency. It got 1.8% of the popular vote. Candidates have stood at various bye-elections since then. In the 2009 European elections they got 51,336 votes (2.9%).in the London region. Except in Na h-Eileanan an Iar they have usually lost their deposits. ==References== Category:Political parties in the United Kingdom Category:2004 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Christian Party (UK)
